com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.orbiters

Class Comet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.SpaceObject
      • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.orbiters.OrbitingSpaceObject
        • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.orbiters.Comet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Movable

    public class Comet
extends OrbitingSpaceObject
    This class models a comet object. This class inherits from the OrbitingSpaceObject superclass to provide move functionality.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Comet(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String colour, double diameter, Point location, SpaceObject objectOrbiting, double speed)
      Calling the OrbitingSpaceObject superclass constructor initialises member variables for the comet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void move(SolarSystem system)
      Updates the current angle of the comet according to it's speed.

      • Methods inherited from class com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.orbiters.OrbitingSpaceObject

        draw, getObjectOrbiting

      • Methods inherited from class com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.SpaceObject

        getColour, getDiameter, getLocation, getName, getSpeed, setDiameter, setSpeed

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Comet

        public Comet(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String colour,
             double diameter,
             Point location,
             SpaceObject objectOrbiting,
             double speed)
        Calling the OrbitingSpaceObject superclass constructor initialises member variables for the comet.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the comet.
        colour - The colour of the comet.
        diameter - The diameter of the comet.
        location - A Point object consisting of a distance and an angle to model the comet's location.
        objectOrbiting - The space object about which the comet orbits.
        speed - The speed of the comet.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(SolarSystem system)
        Updates the current angle of the comet according to it's speed. This method implements a custom elliptical orbit path for the comet.
        Specified by:
        move in interface Movable
        Overrides:
        move in class OrbitingSpaceObject
        Parameters:
        system - The solar system to draw the object in.
